itunes:title: One-Sit Reads
title: One-Sit Reads
description:
In Episode 5 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee are talking about One Sit Reads! They share what they're loving lately, their latest read, a shelf addition, and have book talk about one sit reads, books that are so hard to put down they beg to be read in one sitting!Â 

*Time stamps with each book mentioned and it's image can be found on our website Booktalketc.com

Loving Lately
2:28 Must Read Summer Book Lists
SheReads.com
MarieClaire.com
GoodHousekeeping.com
OprahDaily.com
Parade.com
PublishersWeekly.com
Cosmopolitan.com
TravelandLeisure.com
4:10 Olive and June Manicure kit

Latest Reads
7:16 The Maidens- Alex Michaelides
9:36 That Summer- Jennifer Weiner

Book Talk
20:19 28 Summers- Elin Hilderbrand
22:23 Infinite Country- Patricia Engel
25:52 The Boys Club - Erica Katz
27:5 Tiger Woods- Jeff Benedict
32:33 Young Jane Young- Gabrielle Zevin
34:50 Castle of Water- Dane Hucklebridge
37:43 Sourdough- Robin Sloan
40:11 The Idea of You- Robinne Lee

Shelf Additions
45:54 Why We Fly - Kimberly Jones Gilly SiegalÂ 
48:28 The View Was Exhausting - Mikaella Clements, Onjuli Datta

Other Books Mentioned
The Storied Life of AJ Fikrey- Gabrielle Zevin
Verity- Colleen Hoover
I'm Not Dying with You Tonight- Kimberly Jones, Gilly Siegal

*The book titles listed here are linked to Amazon Affiliate, there is no cost to you to purchase this way or even shop for other things but a small portion of your purchase will come back to us which will help with costs of the show.Â  Thank you for supporting us!*

Please consider Supporting the show (https://www.buymeacoffee.com/BTetc)! This helps us with the costs of producing the podcast and allows us to continue to bring you great content!

Connect with each of us for more book discussion, recs, and reviews. On Instagram, Tina is at @Tbretc

Support the show

Thanks so much for listening!ðŸŽ§

Connect with us! On Instagram- Tina @Tbrec, Renee @Itsbooktalk, Jonathan @infiltrate_jay, & the podcast @booktalketc

Email us at booktalketc@gmail
